properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 9 at 6:43PM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The Flood Warning continues for parts of the Tennessee River.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Tennessee River at Perryville
* until further notice.
* At 6 PM Sunday the stage was 366.4 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 365.0 feet.
* The river rose above flood stage Saturday February 8 and will
continue rising to near 372.6 feet by Sunday February 16.
Additional rises may be possible thereafter.
* At 372.0 feet...In Decatur County, at Cherokee Heights, the
entrance to parking lot to boat launch area is flooded. Main
evacuation road to Lost Creek Boat Dock and Landing closes.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued when conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
